Command.name: Comment
Command.Description: Allows the programmer to write a comment. [up to 120 characters]

Command.name: Add
Command.Description: Add the direct value or the contents of the specified counter to the internal register value

Command.name: And
Command.Description: ANDs the specified value with the internal register, stores the result to the internal register.

Command.name: Counter load
Command.Description: The internal register value is set in the counter with specified number. The character string register details are set in the character string with the specified value.

Command.name: Compare counter
Command.Description: The value of the specified counter is set in the internal register. The details of the specified character string set in the character string register.

Command.name: Counter read
Command.Description: The details of the specified counter or character string are read out

Command.name: Disable act
Command.Description: Disables an interrupt of the specified bit through the external input port.

Command.name: Decrement counter
Command.Description: Subtracts 1 from the value in the specified counter.

Command.name: Divide
Command.Description: Divide the internal register value by the direct value or the contents of the specified counter.

Command.name: Draw joint
Command.Description: Rotates the specified joint by the specified angle from the current position.

Command.name: Decrement position
Command.Description: Moves the robot to a predefined position with a number smaller than the current one. (Joint interpolation)

Command.name: Data read
Command.Description: Reads the values of the internal register, hand check state, and general output state.

Command.name: Draw straight
Command.Description: Moves the end of the hand to a position away from the current position by the distance specified in X, Y, and Z directions. (Linear interpolation)

Command.name: Draw
Command.Description: Moves the end of the hand to a position away from the current position by the distance specified in X, Y, and Z directions. (Joint interpolation)

Command.name: End
Command.Description: Ends the program.

Command.name: Error read
Command.Description: Reads the current error status and alarm history contents.

Command.name: Grab close
Command.Description: Close the grip of hand.

Command.name: Grip flag
Command.Description: Defines the open/close state of the grip of the hand (used with the PD command).

Command.name: Grab open
Command.Description: Opens the grip of the hand.

Command.name: Grip pressure
Command.Description: Defines the gripping force to be applied when the operated hand is closed and opened.

Command.name: Go sub
Command.Description: Carries out subroutine beginning with the specified line number.

Command.name: Go to
Command.Description: Jumps to the specified line number unconditionally.

Command.name: Here
Command.Description: Defines the current coordinates as the specified position.

Command.name: Halt
Command.Description: Interrupts the motion of the robot and the operation of the program.

Command.name: Home
Command.Description: Defines the current location and the attitude as origin point.

Command.name: Increment counter
Command.Description: Adds 1 to the value of the specified counter.

Command.name: Input direct
Command.Description: Fetches data unconditionally from the external input and hand check input.

Command.name: Increment position
Command.Description: Moves the robot to a predefined position with a number greater than the current one. (Joint interpolation)

Command.name: Line read
Command.Description: Reads the program of the specified line number.

Command.name: Move approach
Command.Description: Moves the hand tip to the added position. (Linear interpolation)

Command.name: Move continuous
Command.Description: Moves the robot continously through the predefined intermediate points between two specified position numbers.

Command.name: Move
Command.Description: Moves the hand tip to the specified position. (Joint interpolation)

Command.name: Move R
Command.Description: Moves the tip of hand through the predefined intermediate positions in circular interpolation.

Command.name: Move RA
Command.Description: Moves to specified position in circulat interpolation.

Command.name: Move straight
Command.Description: Moves the tip of hand to the specified position.

Command.name: Move tool
Command.Description: Moves the tip of hand to a position away from the specified position by the distance as specified in the tool direction. (Joint interpolation)

Command.name: Move tool straight
Command.Description: Moves the tip of hand to a position away from the specified position by the distance as specified in the tool direction. (Linear interpolation)

Command.name: Number
Command.Description: Select the specified program.

Command.name: Nest read
Command.Description: Reads the number of limit pulses of any axis after setting.

Command.name: Nest
Command.Description: Carry out origin setting. (The robot moves to the userdefined origin)

Command.name: New
Command.Description: Deletes the specified program and position data.

Command.name: Next
Command.Description: Specifies the range of a loop in a program executed by the RC command.

Command.name: Origin
Command.Description: Moves to the user-defined origin. (Joint interpolation)

Command.name: Open
Command.Description: Opens communication channel and specify device.

Command.name: Override
Command.Description: Specify program override.

Command.name: Position define
Command.Description: Defines the coordinates (location and angle) of the specified position.

Command.name: Position read
Command.Description: Reads the coordinates of the specified position and the open/close state of the hand.

Command.name: Repeat cycle
Command.Description: Repeats the loop specified by the NX command the specified number of times.

Command.name: Run
Command.Description: Executes the specified part of commands in a program.

Command.name: Reset
Command.Description: Resets the program and error condition.

Command.name: Return
Command.Description: Completes a subroutine and returns to the main program.

Command.name: Shift
Command.Description: Adds each coordinate value of position (b) to each coordinate value of position (a) and defines it again as a new position.

Command.name: Step read
Command.Description: Reads the content of the specified step number, or the stopping step number. (using RS232-C)

Command.name: Speed
Command.Description: Sets the operating speed, acceleration or deceleration time and the continuous path setting.

Command.name: Timer
Command.Description: Halts the motion for the specified length of time.

Command.name: Version read
Command.Description: Reads the software version of the system ROM.

Command.name: Where
Command.Description: Reads the coordinates of the current position and the open or close state of the hand. (Using RS-232C)
